boardGames.name: Catan
boardGames.description: A game of trading and building, where players collect resources to build settlements, cities, and roads to win the game.

boardGames.name: Ticket to Ride
boardGames.description: Players collect train cards and claim railway routes across the map to score points.

boardGames.name: Pandemic
boardGames.description: Players work together to stop the spread of four deadly diseases threatening the world.

boardGames.name: Chess
boardGames.description: A two-player abstract strategy game where the objective is to checkmate the opponent's king.

boardGames.name: Codenames
boardGames.description: Two teams compete to identify their agents using one-word clues while avoiding the assassin.

boardGames.name: Carcassonne
boardGames.description: Players take turns placing tiles to build cities, roads, and monasteries, scoring points based on their completion.

boardGames.name: Monopoly
boardGames.description: Players roll dice to move around the board, buy properties, and build houses and hotels to bankrupt their opponents.

boardGames.name: The Game of Life
boardGames.description: Players navigate through life, making decisions on career, family, and finances, with the goal of having the most money at retirement.

boardGames.name: Risk
boardGames.description: A world domination game where players deploy armies and engage in battles to conquer territories.

boardGames.name: Scrabble
boardGames.description: Players use letter tiles to form words on a game board and score points based on the letters used.
